segments.text: Excuse me . Do you mind if I ask some things about work for this company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've heard that the company is very strict with its staff.Is that true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really , so long as you follow all the regulations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you make mistakes in your job , you'll be fired . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Everyone has a chance to correct his or her mistakes . The most important thing is to be responsible for your work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Working here involves a busy schedule and overtime.Is that true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.That ' s true . We are always busy . The company attaches great importance to high efficiency . Sometimes we have to work overtime , but not always . And we have extra pay for extra work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that working in a foreign enterprise is not the same as I expected . Thank you for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
